DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess distribution , awareness control main cardiovascular risk factor Spanish population . The main study variable : - Lifestyles ( tobacco , alcohol , nutrition , physical activity ) - Biological risk factor either well-established ( blood lipid , glucose , insulin blood pressure ) emergent ( leptin , C-reactive protein marker inflammation )
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection comprise 3 sequential stage : 1. computer-assisted telephone interview obtain information lifestyle , knowledge attitude cardiovascular disease risk factor , sign symptom heart attack stroke , subjective health , morbidity ; 2. first homevisit , collect blood urine sample analysis central laboratory ; 3. second home visit , measure anthropometric variable blood pressure administer computer-assisted dietary history ; data functional limitation also collect participant age 65 year old .
